snippet.title: Asgard’s Wrath 2 - Official Launch Trailer | Game Awards 2023
snippet.description:
Watch the action-packed launch trailer for Asgard’s Wrath 2, as revealed during The Game Awards 2023. The trailer showcases gameplay and battles against various monsters. We also learn about the threat that awaits from the Trickster God Loki in this VR action RPG from developer Sanzaru Games. Asgard's Wrath 2 will be available on Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest 3, and Meta Quest Pro on December 15, 2023. 

Asgard’s Wrath 2 transports you into distant realms and transforms you into a Cosmic Guardian, tasked with saving reality itself from the evil chaos of the Trickster God Loki. Explore massive realms, dominate in brutal physical combat, and forge your fate as you battle gods and monsters.

#IGN #Gaming #TheGameAwards
